title: SOP-001 Permission Matrix Update - Grant QA Route Permission

comment: Procedural compliance verified. CR-006 accurately identifies that SOP-001 Section 4.2 lacks 'route' permission for QA. The permission matrix at lines 61-68 confirms QA has: assign, review, approve, reject, fix - but NOT route. This CR correctly proposes adding 'route' to align the SOP with CLI implementation from CR-005. Scope is appropriately limited. No TU reviewers required - this is a straightforward SOP text update.

Post-review verification complete. EI table shows all 3 items COMPLETE with evidence. SOP-001 v9.1 verified: (1) revision_summary correctly references CR-006, (2) Section 4.2 Permission Matrix line 63 now shows 'route, release, close | Yes | Yes | -' granting QA the route permission. Change executed exactly as documented. Conflict with CLI implementation resolved.
